items.title: Tips for your upcoming candidate selection call w/ Go2 founder Scott ...
items.htmlTitle: Tips for your upcoming candidate selection call w/ Go2 founder Scott ...
items.snippet: This video is meant to help teammates be in a mindset that will help them crush a candidate selection call.
items.htmlSnippet: This video is meant to help teammates be in a mindset that will help them crush a candidate selection call.

metatags.twitter:title: Tips for your upcoming candidate selection call w/ Go2 founder Scott Moran | Loom
metatags.og:title: Tips for your upcoming candidate selection call w/ Go2 founder Scott Moran | Loom
metatags.og:description:
Video is part of this article, which contains more information on how a candidate selection call works. 
https://intercom.help/go2/en/articles/6182968-how-a-go2-candidate-selection-call-works-for-teammates

This video is meant to help teammates be in a mindset that will help them crush a candidate selection call.

If you have any questions or concerns about your upcoming candidate selection call the best person to reach out to is our head of matching aina@go2.io. 

If you have issues with your experience with our matching team or the recruitment process in general and want to give feedback, please reach out to S@go2.io

Thank you, seriously. 

For a little more info on what we are about and to learn about the values we look for in a Go2 team member - click here - https://go2io.notion.site/

items.title: Intro to co-founder Vinay | Loom
items.snippet: Loom creates an ongoing visual and audible experience across our business and enables our employees to feel part of a unified culture and company.
